entry.header: The last business card you'll ever need!
entry.subheader: First impression is the key to success!
entry.text: Get a modern and interactive business card with VortexCards. Showcase your brand in an amazing way and stand out from your competitors!

infoVideo.text: VortexCards is a powerful marketing and search tool that helps you immediately present yourself in a memorable way at the first point of contact and positions you as the only logical choice.
infoVideo.textCon: It's designed to help you connect with high-quality prospects, deliver your marketing message, and engage in conversations that turn into happy customers.

clients.title: Designed to help you earn more
clients.subheader: Get more offers and close more deals when potential clients visit your mini-site.

cta.text: We handle content filling and business card creation.

fullInfo.title: VortexCards provides you these services
fullInfo.subheader: BRAND, POSITION, AND DIFFERENTIATE YOURSELF AT THE FIRST POINT OF CONTACT.

first.title: Smart branding
first.desc: Share your digital business card anywhere

second.title: Engaging design
second.desc: The card makes your brand impactful

fifth.title: Easy contact exchange
fifth.desc: We link your number to your website, exchanging numbers and names verbally is now history.

profit.title: Designed to help you earn more
profit.subheader: Get more offers and close more deals when potential clients visit your mini-site.

first.title: Attract more referrals and clients
first.text: Allow your potential and current clients to send you emails, calls, and text messages with a single button press.

second.title: Connecting with customers becomes easier
second.text: These quick NFC-equipped business cards make information and contact exchange easier and perfect your business.

third.title: Showcase your work effortlessly
third.text: You're probably tired of opening Telegram every time to present your service. These cards contain all the information you want.

first.testimonial: A very useful and necessary product, especially in my work activities, considering the constant meetings and negotiations with partners. I think this is a very relevant solution that matches modern trends and technologies.

notFound.title: You are lost on the Internet!

first.title: 1. General Terms
first.content: By using this website, you agree to the following terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

second.title: 2. Right to Use the Service
second.list1: Users must enter their personal information correctly and truthfully
second.list2: The service must be used only for legal and appropriate purposes

third.title: 3. User Obligations
third.list2: Do not engage in any harmful or illegal activities when using the service

fourth.title: 4. Service Limitations
fourth.text: VortexCards reserves the right to suspend or cancel a user's account in the following cases:
fourth.list1: Using the service for fraudulent purposes
fourth.list2: Posting content that harms third parties
fourth.list3: Threatening the security of the website or system

fifth.title: 5. Intellectual Property Rights
fifth.content: All texts, images, logos, and designs located on this website belong to VortexCards. Users may use these materials only for personal or non-commercial purposes.

sixth.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
sixth.content: We strive to ensure the continuous operation of our services and the accuracy of information, however, we are not responsible for problems arising from technical malfunctions or third-party influences.

seventh.title: 7. Changes to Terms
seventh.content: VortexCards reserves the right to change these terms at any time. Changes come into effect from the day they are published on the website.

eighth.title: 8. Contact Us
eighth.content: If you have questions regarding these terms, you can contact us:

first.title: 1. Introduction
first.content: This privacy policy explains how VortexCards collects, stores, and uses personal information of users. We respect your privacy and strive to ensure the security of your personal information.

second.title: 2. What Information Do We Collect?
second.content: We may collect the following information:
second.list4: Your website or social network profile information

third.title: 3. How Is Your Information Used?
third.content: We use users' personal information for the following purposes:
third.list1: Creating your profile and allowing you to use our service
third.list2: Establishing communication and improving service quality
third.list3: Informing about new services and promotions

fourth.title: 4. Do We Share Your Personal Information with Third Parties?
fourth.content: No, your personal information will not be shared with third parties without your permission. It may only be provided to relevant authorities if legally required or to ensure security measures.

fifth.title: 5. Use of Cookies
fifth.content: We use cookies to improve the experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings at any time.

sixth.title: 6. User Rights
sixth.list1: View, modify, or delete your information
sixth.list2: Opt out of our marketing messages

seventh.title: 7. Contact Us
seventh.content: If you have questions regarding these terms, you can contact us:
